Well I don't know about the best but I'll tell a story that relates. I took a cooking class in school because I wanted to better my abilities. We were put into groups (annoying), I was put into a group of, for the most part, strangers who basically knew nothing about cooking. Now, I myself am a vegetarian so I didn't eat most the stuff we cooked. but the members of my group were so incompetent of cooking the meat that I ended up doing it myself. I felt as even though it had died, it was far better to not waste what was already their, which would have happened if they had tried to cool it.
